title: Software Developer at Encora Inc
description: I have been actively involved in internal projects focused on Data and Generative AI, developing accelerators that enhance efficiency and innovation across teams. In parallel, I contributed to improving processes for Talent Acquisition, particularly in recruiting and evaluating candidates for Android development and Java/Kotlin backend roles. This work combined technical expertise with strategic process optimization, ensuring both cutting-edge project delivery and stronger alignment between engineering talent and organizational needs.

title: Client Director and Engineering Manager at Encora Inc
description: I coached and managed 56 engineers across the USA, Mexico, Argentina, Costa Rica, Colombia, and India while overseeing 17 client accounts in industries such as logistics, travel, healthcare, education, and energy. My role included facilitating kickoff meetings, defining expectations, and drafting contracts (SOW, MSA, EAF), as well as implementing performance improvement programs, onboarding/offboarding processes, and regular team health checks. I conducted weekly and biweekly meetings, one-on-one sessions for workload and wellbeing, performance and salary reviews, and ensured financial health within accounts. Additionally, I supported talent delivery, assigned roles, coordinated travel, presented Encora’s capabilities in Gen AI, Cloud, and Data, created fiscal reports and industry updates, interviewed candidates, designed challenges for the Spark Internship Program, mentored developers on the bench, and managed internal products and accelerators.

title: Android Developer at Crew App
description: In my role, I spearheaded the modernization of legacy systems by developing and executing strategies to migrate code from Java to Kotlin, enhancing efficiency and maintainability. I also created proof-of-concept implementations using coroutines to demonstrate innovative features and significant performance gains, which informed key project decisions. Additionally, I built continuous integration support from the ground up, streamlining deployment processes and reducing errors. I contributed to defining and documenting best practices and coding standards, fostering a collaborative and high-quality development environment. My responsibilities extended to implementing and demonstrating new features, ensuring seamless integration and user adoption. Finally I helped as a translator between English and Spanish for the development team, facilitating clear communication and understanding across diverse team members and negotiations with Grupo Bimbo.

title: Android Developer at Harvestmark
description: I led the modernization of the application by creating and implementing a strategy to migrate all legacy code from Eclipse to Android Studio, while also introducing internationalization to support broader global use. I developed bilingual user documentation in English and Spanish, documented processes in Confluence, and described app functionalities using UML for clarity and consistency. My contributions included improving the performance of in-built scanners and optimizing database queries to reduce memory usage and response times. I regularly presented monthly performance reports, updated camera functions, and ultimately delivered a new version of the app tailored for deployment in the Chinese market.

title: Full-stack Developer at Switchfly Inc
description: I developed integrations for hotel, travel, and activity services within Disney's platform and Tam Viagens, ensuring seamless functionality across different domains. In addition, I enhanced the automation testing framework to improve reliability and efficiency, and participated in an internal hackathon where I contributed to reducing response times. To support onboarding and knowledge sharing, I also created monthly proof-of-concepts (PoCs) that were presented to new joiners, showcasing practical implementations and fostering innovation within the team.

title: Lead Developer and Project Manager at Ondore
description: Worked with different teams as scrum master and project manager to deliver software solutions in two projects: Ondore Scout to monitor social media and internal product to train and monitor data algorithms

title: Lead Developer at Movistar
description: Industry: Healthcare. Implemented a Web application to store med data and history providing a platform for doctors and patients to access their information. Technologies: Java, JSP, Servlets, JDBC, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL.

title: Fullstack Developer at Ondore
description: Industries: Government, Education, Music. Designed and developed backend applications to easy integrate in search engines for the government of Mexico, Universidad de Colima, Ideas Radio Telcel. Implemented data strategies to index and consolidate sources for data search engines. Implemented the web crawlers agents to retrieve the information from diffferent media

title: Intern Fullstack Developer at Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México
description: Industry Education: Assisted in the development and testing of web applications, gaining practical experience in software development. Worked in ALUNAM Project to provide online educational services to students.
